entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a person who renounces the Dark Lord and expresses remorse for his past actions. He mentions seeing people doing the Dark Lord's bidding with his own eyes.

entities.name: antonin dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is a person mentioned by Karkaroff as someone who tortured Muggles and non-supporters of the Dark Lord. He was caught shortly after Karkaroff.

entities.name: evan roiser
entities.description: Rosier is a person mentioned by Karkaroff as one of his names who supported the Dark Lord.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a person present in the conversation and provides additional information about Dolohov's actions.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is a person who asks Karkaroff for names of people who supported the Dark Lord and expresses coldness towards Karkaroff's claims.

relationships.description: Karkaroff saw Dolohov torturing Muggles and non-supporters of the Dark Lord.
Crouch asked Karkaroff for names of people who supported the Dark Lord.
Moody mentioned that Dolohov helped him torture Muggles and non-supporters of the Dark Lord.
